thread.title: MONDAY SPOTLIGHT: Passionate director

author: JESSICA ROBISON, Argus-Press Staff Writer
title: MONDAY SPOTLIGHT: Passionate director
text:
Argus-Press Photo by Jessica Robison Garret Ernst 
Perry High School band teacher Garret Ernst has helped build the band program in the district, with more than 20 percent of high school students in his program. Posted: Monday, October 19, 2015 11:30 am MONDAY SPOTLIGHT: Passionate director By JESSICA ROBISON, Argus-Press Staff Writer The Argus-Press | 0 comments 
PERRY — Garret Ernst knew after he graduated from St. Johns High School that he either wanted to study bio-engineering or music. 
“I liked school, I liked learning — especially science,” the Perry High School band director said of his difficult decision about what to major in. kAmw@H6G6C[ 9:D E:>6 H:E9 E96 |:49:82? $E2E6 &?:G6CD:EJ >2C49:?8 32?5 D62=65 9:D 564:D:@?
